homePage.title: Welcome to Garden Inn
homePage.subtitle: Your gateway to an unforgettable jungle adventure in the heart of North Sumatra.

roomsPage.title: Our Rooms
roomsPage.description: Garden Inn offers only 12 rooms spread across a 1-hectare tropical garden, with incredible jungle views and the opportunity to spot local wildlife right in front of your doorstep.

jungleTreks.title: Jungle Trekking
jungleTreks.description: Enjoy an unforgettable trek through Gunung Leuser National Park, renowned for its lush jungle and diverse wildlife. This adventure offers a unique opportunity to spot wild orangutans and other exotic animals in their natural habitat.

info.title: Important Information
info.description: All treks start at 9:00 AM, include park entrance, a certified guide, and return by traditional rafting. Overnight treks include a full campsite setup with a personal cook.
info.whatToBringDetails: Hiking shoes, swimwear, towel. For overnight stays, pack long clothing, a jacket, and a flashlight.

other.title: Other Excursions
other.description: Immerse yourself in the local culture and nature with our unique activities.

massage.name: Massage
massage.description: Enjoy a relaxing session after your trek. The traditional massage helps release tension and restore your energy and sense of well-being.

cooking.name: Cooking Class
cooking.description: Discover the flavors of Sumatra and learn to cook traditional dishes using fresh ingredients from the daily market. Explore a variety of vegetables, herbs, and spices, and learn how to prepare and combine them. After the class, relax and enjoy the meal youâ€™ve cooked.

details.dishes: Choose 2 dishes from: Gado-gado, Asam Manis, Kari, Semur, Sate, and Sambal.
details.options: Vegetarian and vegan options are available.

village.name: Village Tour
village.description: Explore the village by becak (traditional motorbike with a sidecar) or by bicycle to see rice paddies, fruit and vegetable plantations, and the traditional production of brown sugar and tofu. Finish your trip with a delicious lunch in the rice fields while enjoying a refreshing fresh coconut.

night.name: Night Trek
night.description: Experience the jungle after dark! During this night trek, youâ€™ll have the chance to spot animals that are hard to see during the day, as they usually hide from the heat and sunlight. You might encounter snakes, scorpions, centipedes, frogs, lizards, and other fascinating nocturnal creatures.

flower.name: Flower Trip
flower.description: A nature escape in search of rare flowers such as the Rafflesia or the Titan Arum. This trip is only possible when a flower is blooming nearby â€” as their appearance is random, please contact us to check current availability.

transfers.title: Transfers
transfers.description: Travel with ease. We offer reliable private transfers and tourist bus options to and from major destinations in North Sumatra.

info.title: Travel Seamlessly
info.description: We organize private transfers and tourist bus connections to make your journey to and from the jungle as smooth as possible. All our drivers are experienced and vehicles are air-conditioned for your comfort.
